import{useWorkoutsContext}from'../hooks/useWorkoutsContext';// date fns
import formatDistanceToNow from'date-fns/formatDistanceToNow';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WorkoutDetails=_ref=>{let{workout}=_ref;const{dispatch}=useWorkoutsContext();const handleClick=async()=>{const response=await fetch('/api/workouts/'+workout._id,{method:'DELETE'});const json=await response.json();if(response.ok){dispatch({type:'DELETE_WORKOUT',payload:json});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"workout-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:workout.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Load (kg): "}),workout.load]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Number of reps: "}),workout.reps]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:formatDistanceToNow(new Date(workout.createdAt),{addSuffix:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-symbols-outlined",onClick:handleClick,children:"delete"})]});};export default WorkoutDetails;
